Question:
What were the average minutes_in_deep_sleep and the average steps across all users within one week, starting from 2022-05-24?

Schema (DDL):
```sql
CREATE TABLE `pa_active_minutes` (
  `id` varchar(20) NOT NULL,
  `ts` datetime NOT NULL,
  `fat_burn_minutes` smallint unsigned DEFAULT NULL,
  `cardio_minutes` smallint unsigned DEFAULT NULL,
  `peak_minutes` smallint unsigned DEFAULT NULL,
  `sedentary_minutes` smallint unsigned DEFAULT NULL,
  `lightly_active_minutes` smallint unsigned DEFAULT NULL,
  `moderately_active_minutes` smallint unsigned DEFAULT NULL,
  `very_active_minutes` smallint unsigned DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`,`ts`),
  CONSTRAINT `fk_pa_intensity_id` FOREIGN KEY (`id`) REFERENCES `participants` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci

CREATE TABLE `pa_daily_summary` (
  `id` varchar(20) NOT NULL,
  `ts` datetime NOT NULL,
  `resting_heart_rate` decimal(5,2) DEFAULT NULL,
  `altitude_m` smallint DEFAULT NULL,
  `calories_kcal` decimal(8,2) DEFAULT NULL,
  `steps` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL,
  `distance_m` decimal(10,2) DEFAULT NULL,
  `minutes_below_default_zone_1` smallint unsigned DEFAULT NULL,
  `minutes_in_default_zone_1` smallint unsigned DEFAULT NULL,
  `minutes_in_default_zone_2` smallint unsigned DEFAULT NULL,
  `minutes_in_default_zone_3` smallint unsigned DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`,`ts`),
  CONSTRAINT `fk_pa_sum mary_id` FOREIGN KEY (`id`) REFERENCES `participants` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci

CREATE TABLE `pa_reports` (
  `session_id` bigint NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `id` varchar(20) NOT NULL,
  `record_ts` datetime NOT NULL,
  `activity_name` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL,
  `average_heart_rate` decimal(5,2) DEFAULT NULL,
  `duration` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL,
  `active_duration` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL,
  `calories` decimal(8,2) DEFAULT NULL,
  `steps` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL,
  `sedentary_minutes` smallint unsigned DEFAULT NULL,
  `_lightly_active_minutes` smallint unsigned DEFAULT NULL,
  `fairly_active_minutes` smallint unsigned DEFAULT NULL,
  `very_active_minutes` smallint unsigned DEFAULT NULL,
  `out_of_range_minutes` smallint unsigned DEFAULT NULL,
  `out_of_range_minimum_heart_rate` decimal(5,2) DEFAULT NULL,
  `out_of_range_maximum_heart_rate` decimal(5,2) DEFAULT NULL,
  `out_of_range_calories` decimal(8,2) DEFAULT NULL,
  `fat_burn_minutes` smallint unsigned DEFAULT NULL,
  `fat_burn_minimum_heart_rate` decimal(5,2) DEFAULT NULL,
  `fat_burn_maximum_heart_rate` decimal(5,2) DEFAULT NULL,
  `fat_burn_calories` decimal(8,2) DEFAULT NULL,
  `cardio_minutes` smallint unsigned DEFAULT NULL,
  `cardio_minimum_heart_rate` decimal(5,2) DEFAULT NULL,
  `cardio_maximum_heart_rate` decimal(5,2) DEFAULT NULL,
  `cardio_calories` decimal(8,2) DEFAULT NULL,
  `peak_minutes` smallint unsigned DEFAULT NULL,
  `peak_minimum_heart_rate` decimal(5,2) DEFAULT NULL,
  `peak_maximum_heart_rate` decimal(5,2) DEFAULT NULL,
  `peak_calories` decimal(8,2) DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`session_id`),
  KEY `idx_pa_reports_id_ts` (`id`,`record_ts`),
  CONSTRAINT `fk_pa_reports_id` FOREIGN KEY (`id`) REFERENCES `participants` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=1455 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci

CREATE TABLE `additional_sleep` (
  `sleep_id` bigint NOT NULL,
  `id` varchar(20) NOT NULL,
  `start_time` datetime DEFAULT NULL,
  `end_time` datetime DEFAULT NULL,
  `duration` smallint DEFAULT NULL,
  `minutes_asleep` smallint DEFAULT NULL,

  PRIMARY KEY (`sleep_id`),
  KEY `id` (`id`),
  CONSTRAINT `additional_sleep_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`id`) REFERENCES `participants` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE

  PRIMARY KEY (`id`,`ts`),
  CONSTRAINT `heart_rate_variability_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`id`) REFERENCES `participants` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE

  `rem_sleep_standard_deviation` decimal(4,1) DEFAULT NULL,
  `rem_sleep_signal_to_noise` decimal(6,2) DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`,`night_end`),
  CONSTRAINT `fk_resprate_id` FOREIGN KEY (`id`) REFERENCES `participants` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci

CREATE TABLE `oxygen_sat_daily` (
  `id` varchar(20) NOT NULL,
  `ts` datetime NOT NULL,
  `sleep_average_oxygen_saturation` decimal(5,2) DEFAULT NULL,
  `lower_bound_oxygen_saturation` decimal(5,2) DEFAULT NULL,
  `upper_bound_oxygen_saturation` decimal(5,2) DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`,`ts`),
  CONSTRAINT `oxygen_sat_daily_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`id`) REFERENCES `participants` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci

CREATE TABLE `skin_temp_sleep_nightly` (
  `id` varchar(20) NOT NULL,
  `start_sleep` datetime NOT NULL,
  `end_sleep` datetime NOT NULL,
  `temperature_samples` int unsigned DEFAULT NULL,
  `nightly_temperature` decimal(5,2) DEFAULT NULL,
  `baseline_relative_sample_sum` decimal(10,4) DEFAULT NULL,
  `baseline_relative_sample_sum_of_squares` decimal(12,4) DEFAULT NULL,
  `baseline_relative_nightly_standard_deviation` decimal(6,4) DEFAULT NULL,

  PRIMARY KEY (`id`,`start_sleep`),
  KEY `idx_sleep_end` (`end_sleep`),
  CONSTRAINT `fk_sleep_temp_id` FOREIGN KEY (`id`) REFERENCES `participants` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci

CREATE TABLE `stress_daily_scores` (
  `id` varchar(20) NOT NULL,
  `ts` datetime NOT NULL,
  `stress_score` smallint unsigned DEFAULT NULL,
  `sleep_points` smallint DEFAULT NULL,
  `responsiveness_points` smallint DEFAULT NULL,
  `exertion_points` smallint DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`,`ts`),
  CONSTRAINT `fk_stress_id` FOREIGN KEY (`id`) REFERENCES `participants` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci

CREATE TABLE `food_meal_labels` (
  `id` varchar(20) NOT NULL,
  `ts` datetime NOT NULL,
  `image_id` varchar(100) NOT NULL,
  `category` varchar(128) NOT NULL,
  `subcategory` varchar(128) NOT NULL,
  `cooking_style` varchar(128) NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`,`ts`,`image_id`,`category`,`subcategory`,`cooking_style`),
  KEY `idx_id_ts` (`id`,`ts`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci
